idea-plugin.name: ActionScript Profiler
idea-plugin.description: The plugin allows you to profile your ActionScript and Flex applications by showing CPU sampling and memory snapshot information.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
In 0.2.4 Profile Air applications. Proper handling of Windows 7 / Vista.
In 0.2.3 Added view for live class instances with reachability information (let's start leak hunting).
In 0.2.2 Show plain list for invoked functions. Fixed bug with no snapshotting second time
In 0.2.1 Capture memory snapshot implemented, added "Do GC" button.
